class DLSchemePublicKey: botan.pubkey.pk_keys.PublicKey;
This class represents discrete logarithm (DL) public keys.

final const @property string algoName();
Used for object casting to the right type in the factory.

final const ref const(DLGroup) getDomain();
Get the DL domain parameters of this key.

Returns:
DL domain parameters of this key

final const ref const(BigInt) getY();
Get the public value m_y with m_y = g^m_x mod p where m_x is the secret key.

final void setY(BigInt y);
Set the value m_y

final const ref const(BigInt) groupP();
Get the prime p of the underlying DL m_group.

Returns:
prime p

final const ref const(BigInt) groupQ();
Get the prime q of the underlying DL m_group.

Returns:
prime q

final const ref const(BigInt) groupG();
Get the generator g of the underlying DL m_group.

Returns:
generator g

protected BigInt m_y;
The DL public key

protected DLGroup m_group;
The DL group

protected DLGroup.Format m_format;
options

class DLSchemePrivateKey: botan.pubkey.algo.dl_algo.DLSchemePublicKey, botan.pubkey.pk_keys.PrivateKey, botan.pubkey.pk_keys.PKKeyAgreementKey;
This class represents discrete logarithm (DL) private keys.

const ref const(BigInt) getX();
Get the secret key m_x.

Returns:
secret key

package BigInt m_x;
The DL private key
